<h1 align="center">
  Memepants
</h1>

Simple Web App that allows for quick searching of Spongebob Memes. Utilizes Google Search with Infinite Scrolling feature. 

_Built with Gatsby with Node server and hosted with Heroku._

**Check out the deployed site [here](https://memepants-prod.herokuapp.com/)!**
